transferMessage.en: You are being transferred to an agent.
transferMessage.fr: Vous êtes transféré à un agent.
transferMessage.es: Se le está transfiriendo a un agente.

assignMessage.en: You have been assigned to our agent {{agentName}}.
assignMessage.fr: Vous avez été assigné à notre agent(e) {{agentName}}.

resolveMessage.en: You are being transferred back to the bot.
resolveMessage.es: Se le está transfiriendo de vuelta al bot.

reassignMessage.en: Agent {{agentName}} has reassigned your conversation. We are looking for another available agent, please wait a moment.
reassignMessage.es: El agente {{agentName}} ha reasignado su conversación. Estamos buscando otro agente disponible, por favor espere un momento.

reassignSuccessMessage.en: Your conversation has been reassigned to agent {{agentName}}.
reassignSuccessMessage.es: Su conversación ha sido reasignada al agente {{agentName}}.

reassignErrorMessage.en: Sorry, there was an error reassigning your conversation. Your conversation has been returned to me.
reassignErrorMessage.es: Lo siento, hubo un error al reasignar su conversación. Su conversación me ha sido devuelta.

shortcuts.name: hello
shortcuts.value: Hello! How can I help you today?

shortcuts.name: thanks
shortcuts.value: Thank you for contacting us. Have a great day!
